columns.text:
Above Blue stands for an individual, aesthetic, service-driven and romantic experience on the world’s most passionate island. Genuine hospitality, local architecture, culinary authenticity, awe-inspiring vistas and personalized service combine to offer you a glimpse of a world of unsurpassed charm. 

Fully equipped to satisfy the most demanding guests, Above Blue is where your most lavish desires come to life. The Facilities & Services list reveals the menu for a luxury tailor-made experience in Santorini.

Above Blue Suites key feature & selling points

  • 10 individually designed color – coded suites
  • All suites with magnificent view to the Aegean sea, volcano, sunset and village of Oia
  • Magnificent pool with optical fibers scattered along its bottom
  • Tailor made services prior to arrival, such as, online check in, room scent and temperature, in house music and movies, candle light and rose petals decoration, satin beds sheets and more…
  • Especially for honeymooners: room decoration with candles and rose petals, one bottle of champagne upon arrival.
  • For all guests we offer memento gifts upon departure
  • Audio visual includes: personal notebook, free Wi-Fi internet access, LCD TV satellite channels, DVD / CD / radio / Mp3 player, iPod charger & speakers / cell phone
  • A la carte room service American breakfast
  • Pillow menu
  • Champagne glasses on the first sunsets
  • Application for iPhone, iPad, and Android dedicated to provide:

Guest services like fast online check in, wake up call, all tailor made services, in room dining and reservations for other activities (restaurants, excursions, car rentals), order amenities, request for extra cleaning, maintenance, fast check out.

Information about the island, tips, local map, local weather, where to eat, activities, what to buy.

Photo gallery.

items.title: Hotel Facilities
items.description:
• 24-Hours reception with concierge assistance
  • All suites with Caldera sea view
  • Each room individually designed and furnished
  • Fresh water Swimming pool with sun-loungers
  • Pool bar offering drinks & light snacks
  • A la carte “Above & Beyond” Gourmet restaurant
  • Complimentary American champagne breakfast
  • Welcome drink upon arrival
  • Room service
  • Private candlelight dinners
  • Bespoke Picnic Basket
  • Candle light and rose petals room decoration on request
  • Twice daily maid service
  • Laundry & valet services
  • Porter service
  • Free public parking
  • Free Wi-Fi internet access throughout the hotel
  • Doctor on call
  • Postal/parcel services
  • Floral requests
  • Private massages, beauty treatments and therapies
  • Manicure, Pedicure and Makeup artist services
  • Hair dresser services
  • Baby sitting services
  • Airport & port transportation
  • All rooms are smoke free

items.title: Dedicated Concierge Activities
items.description:
• Private & semi-private sailing tours, cruises and excursions
  • Wine tasting tours
  • Private limousine tours
  • Helicopter services
  • Yacht hiring
  • Sea Kayak, Diving and snorkeling activities
  • Back horse riding
  • Rock Climbing, Hiking & trekking activities
  • Car & ATV rental

SEO.title: Facilities | Above Blue Suites | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Above Blue Suites' facilities include private outdoor heated jacuzzis, private sea view terraces with sun loungers, Free Wi-Fi and smart TVs.
